boardgame.name: Lobotomy
boardgame.description: Take the role of escaped mental patients in this fully cooperative board game for 1 to 5 players. Enter the abandoned mental hospital from your worst nightmares. Each player controls a different crazy character with their own story and phobias which can become reality in any moment. There is one goal: to escape. But it is not easy when you think that all the staff are the evil monsters and the warden is the worst of them._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Lobotomy is a scenario based adventure/dungeon crawler game. Lobotomy introduces such features as:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; big (yes very big) modular board where each module is a different part of the hospital (including outside areas like garden or chapel)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; completely different characters, with their own stories and mental illness which define their skills and powers_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; different monsters, mostly based upon the old pulp horror movies_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; fight, explore, or learn about your past, but you don't have much time until the warden finds you, and you must be prepared to face him_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;All characters and monsters have their own awesome miniatures (with over fifty in the base set)._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Episode 182: Micro Machines Of The Wild
